events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer’s message regarding dissatisfaction and refund.
The refund request case has been assigned to our customer support agent for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the product didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The item looks different than the pictures online and the quality is poor, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send the item back at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label, that makes the process easier for me.
Your refund has been processed and you should see the amount returned to your account within 5 to 7 business days.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and if you need any further assistance or have additional questions.
Since we have not heard back from you, we will now close this case. Feel free to contact us again if needed.
